this_title: Cuban Memories – Un Dia Con Fidel
introduction: an extraordinary unique collection, unreleased images, impressive reportages, live interviews, exclusive declarations, tracing the tormented destiny of Cuba."BERLIN HONORS MINA…"The Berlin Film Festival is honoring Italian documentary filmmaker Gianni Mina … with the Festival prize it bestows on film personalities or institutions to whom it is particularly indebted as an expression of appreciation… VARIETY - Ed Meza – 30 Jan 2007
